user.webhookIntro: You can enter a URL here to call whenever a create (POST) or update (PUT/PATCH) event is executed (e.g. an account being created or updated).
user.notificationsDisabled: You will not receive call notifications, but your calls will still be visible in activity streams.

apiToken.noTokenInfo: You need to generate a token before you can use it in your API calls
apiToken.usageInfo: You can use your token with an authorization header
apiToken.usageInfoAlt: Or you can use your token with an url parameter

import.accountIntro: List accounts all at once by importing a .csv file containing account information.
import.contactIntro: List contacts all at once by importing a .csv file containing account information.
import.instructionsTwo: The file should at least contain a column with the header
import.instructionsFourAccount: Information in any additional columns will be added to the description of an account
import.instructionsFourContact: Information in any additional columns will be added to the description of a contact
import.instructionsFive: Please note that headers are case sensitive

settings.timeLogging: Enable this feature so users can log hours on cases and deals.
settings.billingDefault: Sets the default for the 'Billable' value for logged hours.

security.backupTokenIntro: These are your current backup tokens, they will be regenerated after you've used them all.
security.noTwoFactorEnabled: You have not enabled two factor authentication yet.
security.backupPhonesInfo: If your primary method is not available, we are able to send backup tokens to your phone number(s).
security.backupPhonesInfoTooltip: Let me see my phone numbers!
security.noBackupPhones: You currently have no backup phone number(s) available. It is highly recommended that you add one!
security.noBackupPhonesTooltip: Add a new backup phone number
security.backupTokenInfo: If you don't have any device with you, you can access your account using backup tokens.

other.inviteUsersIntro: Adding users adds extra costs to your team's subscription. Ask <0>{{name}}</0> if youâ€™re not sure about this.

billing.trialInfoLine1: Your free trial period will end in <0>{{amount}}</0> {{unit}}.
billing.trialInfoLine2: Upgrade to the Team or Professional plans to continue using all of the Lily features.
billing.trialInfoLine3: Once your trial is over, you'll be set to the free Personal plan if you haven't upgraded.
